short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyses EGU handicap records and calculates your best and average scores for each hole, tee and course you've played

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Analyses EGU handicap records and calculates your best ("eclectic") and average scores for each hole, tee and course you've played. Now you really know which is your scary hole...

Use this by logging into the EGU handicap site (https://members.whsplatform.englandgolf.org/). Then launch the plugin. It will take a few seconds to analyse your rounds (up to twenty according to how many scores and how fast your computer and internet connection are!).

Caveat: I built this mostly for my own entertainment, and it's only been tested on my results on my computer, so there are probably situations for which I haven't catered . If you try it, please let me know whether it worked!
